book.title: A Young Hero
book.description: 简介： A fight! A fight! Form a ring! A dozen or more excited boys shouted these words, and, rushing forward, hastily formed a ring around two playmates who stood in the middle of the road, their hats off, eyes glaring, fists clenched, while they panted wit...
